name: Approach and Landing at Singapore (Air France Airbus A380-800)
description:
Onboard Air France A380 F-HPJG for an early evening approach and landing into Singapore Changi Intl after operating flight AF256 from Paris.  Video taken from seat 89L, in economy on the upper deck.

FULL TRIP REPORT:  http://aviationphotos.co.uk/index.php/trip-reports/312-road-to-singapore-a380-to-singapore-for-100

We commence our approach to the north of Singapore island, before looping around and landing on runway 20C, and then taxying in to stand D56.  It is rush hour at Changi and there are many aircraft queuing for departure.c  

Enjoy the flight.

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y

✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈
